The owners were very easy to communicate with and it is clear that they put a lot of love and care into their rental for your enjoyment- from the welcome note (thank you again!) to the small details that are so big like leaving a washing machine pod & dryer sheet (that was a life saver with a little one)…we felt like we were staying at a friend’s house. Very close to Fort Leonard Wood and all the stores/restaurants in the area to include the quirky area known as Uranus (yes, it is awkwardly spectacular for all the reasons you would expect). Would definitely rent this home again if life brings us back to Missouri. Thank you so much for such a great experience!
